entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 3.
